certifications.title: Azure Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals
certifications.description: This certification allowed me to master the basics of security, compliance, and identity management in the cloud. I learned to apply the Zero Trust principle, protect data, and ensure compliance. I know how to use Azure tools to secure infrastructures, manage access, and monitor threats.

certifications.title: Digital Technologies Architect
certifications.description: This diploma allowed me to master the design and development of digital solutions. I acquired strong skills in project management and software architecture. I learned to solve complex problems and collaborate in agile teams. I used modern technologies to design, deploy, and maintain robust systems. This program prepared me to innovate and tackle current technological challenges.

certifications.title: Azure Data Fundamentals
certifications.description: This certification allowed me to master data management and analysis with Azure. I learned to use relational and NoSQL databases, handle large volumes of data, and leverage Azure analytics services. I know how to transform and integrate data with ETL, and visualize results to facilitate decision-making.

certifications.title: Azure Cloud Fundamentals
certifications.description: This certification allowed me to master the basics of cloud computing with Microsoft Azure. I learned to design, deploy, and manage cloud solutions. I strengthened my knowledge of security, compliance, and cost management. I know how to use Azure tools to optimize operations and improve the efficiency of cloud infrastructures.
